title: Manage Online Merchandise Store Inventory
description: A team's new home jersey is selling out quickly online. An agent needs to check inventory and order more.

tasks.description: Check the current inventory level for the new home jersey in the e-commerce system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that several sizes are close to selling out.

tasks.description: Analyze the sales velocity to forecast when the remaining stock will be depleted.
tasks.expected_outcome: The forecast shows all stock will be gone in 48 hours.

tasks.description: Place a rush reorder with the jersey manufacturer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully places a new purchase order for more jerseys.
